pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download and Manipulate Data from Istat // Download data from Istat (Italian Institute of Statistics) database, both old and new provider (respectively, http://dati.istat.it/ and https://esploradati.istat.it/databrowser/). Additional functions for manipulating data are provided. Moreover, a 'shiny' application called 'shinyIstat' can be used to search, download and filter datasets in an easier way.
